hero.title: App for meaningful living and personal development.
hero.subtitle: Find your purpose, set goals and achieve progress in every area of life.

about.title: What is Progress?
about.description1: Progress is a personal development app that helps you find meaning in life, set clear goals and achieve them systematically. The app combines proven coaching methods with modern technologies.
about.description2: Using intelligent tools, you can track your progress, celebrate achievements and create lasting positive changes in your life. The app is designed to be your personal guide on the path to a better life.
about.description3: All features are based on scientifically proven personal development methods and are tailored to your individual needs and goals.
about.pageSubtitle: Discover the app that helps you find meaning in life and achieve personal growth.
about.featuresSubtitle: What Progress app can do and how it can help you
about.goalSettingDesc: Create clear and achievable goals with the help of intelligent tools.
about.progressTrackingDesc: Measure your progress and celebrate achievements on your path to a better life.
about.inspirationDesc: Get motivation and inspiration for every day of your life.
about.supportDesc: Get support and guidance on your path to personal growth.
about.ctaTitle: Start your journey to a better life
about.ctaSubtitle: Download Progress app and start your transformation today.

onboarding.subtitle: Achieve your goals with greater clarity
onboarding.description: Progress is an app that helps you achieve your goals and gain greater clarity in life. Define your goals, break them down into steps and track your progress.
onboarding.valuesSubtitle: What is most important to you in life?
onboarding.valuesDescription: Choose values that motivate you and guide your decisions. You can also add your own values.
onboarding.clearGoalsDesc: Define your goals with specific metrics
onboarding.dailyStepsDesc: Break goals into small, achievable steps
onboarding.progressTrackingDesc: Measure your progress and celebrate achievements

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: values
settings.autoUpdateDescription: When saving new category settings, all existing goals are automatically updated to have the correct category based on their completion date.

app.title: Progress - Achieve Your Goals
app.description: App for achieving goals and gaining clarity in life. Define your goals, break them down into steps and track your progress.
app.signInSubtitle: Sign in and start achieving your goals
app.signUpSubtitle: Register and start achieving your goals
